name: Bennyistanto.github.io
body:
### Welcome to My GitHub Pages.
I am a 30 year old, an independent geo-information consultant based in Bogor, Indonesia. 

Currently, I work for the United Nations World Food Programme (WFP) as a GIS Programme Officer for Climate Change and Vulnerability Analysis. I am working under Vulnerability Analysis and Mapping (VAM) unit and will support the Government of Indonesia to enhance capacity to monitor, analyze, map and address food insecurity; disaster preparedness and response in line with the Hyogo Framework for Action; and reducing undernutrition to below critical levels.

Find more about me in this website and get in touch, happy surfing!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
